hints.content: $506{,}629$ = $\blueD{5 \text{ hundred thousands}} +0 \text{ ten thousands}$ + $\tealD{6 \text{ thousands}}$ + $\goldD{6 \text{ hundreds}}$ + $\purpleD{2\text{ tens}}$ + $\maroonD{9 \text{ ones}}$
